EnemyInfo.Name: Mother Brain Tubes
EnemyInfo.Description:
Mother Brain's tubes falling. Spawned by Mother Brain during fake death. Hardcoded enemy population entries are located at $A9:8AE5.
Main tube is special and refers to the 16x32 pxÂ² section that Mother Brain sits on in the first phase. It sets Mother Brain's Y position as it's falling until it reaches Y position FCh, where it sets up Mother Brain for the next phase.
RAM: $0FA8: Function. Defines enemy's main AI. Initialised to $8B88 for non-main tubes and $8BCB for main tube. $0FAA: Y threshold position. Non-main tubes only. Once the enemy's Y position exceeds this value, it explodes and gets deleted. $0FAC: Y velocity. [$0FAC] / 100h is added to the enemy's Y position every frame. Initialised to 0. Acceleration is 6/frame: $A9:8B8D for non-main tubes, $A9:8BDB for main tube. $0FAE: Smoke timer. Spawns smoke enemy projectile if negative, decremented every frame. Initialised to 0. Reset value is 8 ($A9:8C37). $0FB0: Smoke counter. Used as index to table of X position offsets to spawn smoke, relative to enemy's X position ($A9:8C61). Initialised to 0. Incremented with each smoke spawned, wraps around from 3 to 0.

Property.Name: Sequence index
Property.Description: Word-aligned index used to initialise enemy from a table $A9:8B5D, setting the X/Y radii, Y position threshold for falling, and initial enemy function. Mother Brain spawns these tubes with indices in the following order: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8.

Property.Name: Fall delay
Property.Description: For the main tube only. The delay in frames before starting to fall. Values 8001h..FFFFh are equivalent to zero.

Property.Name: Instruction list pointer
Property.Description: Simple instruction lists that draws the graphics for the enemy and nothing more. Requires the "process instructions" bit to be set in the enemy "special".
